body:
October 30, 2024

The production release took place after 2:00 p.m. CDT, 10/30/2024.

#  Great News!

The Network360 Team is excited to bring you some bug fixes and a navigation enhancement for Disruption.   

# Enhancements

### Disruption

•	Now, there will be one navigation path to Disruption and Assess Markets as the Settings > “Return to old version option” will no longer be available.   Disruption is accessible through the Sales Tools menu; Assess Markets is accessible through the Brokers Tools menu.  

# Fixes

### Competitive Dashboard

•	Fixed an issue where the Top Networks and Top Network Market Penetration quadrants failed to render when you navigated to Competitive Dashboard immediately after navigating to Disruption (new version).

### Help Center

•	Now, the search field and icon display correctly.  Now, the dropdown list that appears when you type ahead within the search field closes appropriately.
shortDescription: Bug fixes for Competitive Dashboard and Help Center with a navigation enhancement for Disruption.
